body.name: Reliable 4100IS Professional Steam Iron Station with Eco Mode, 120V, 4 Safety System, 2.2L Boiler Stainless Steel Boiler, 2.2M Steam Hose Made with Aluminum Soleplate Iron, Made in Italy
features: THICKER STAINLESS STEEL TANK - All new stainless steel 2.2L boiler for the 4100 series boilers. Now up to 50% thicker!! With an improved shape for superior quality dry steam and a super robust external heating element to enhance the steam performance and the life of the boiler.
ECO MODE- The Eco-Mode lets you put the boiler into a standby state and save you up to 33% in energy costs.
SUPER DRY STEAM - The 4100IS iron uses our patented 32 separate steam chamber soleplate which eliminates condensation and delivers the superior quality steam.
4 SAFETY SYSTEM - The 4100IS professional iron has 4 safety systems including a pressure switch probe safety thermostat on the heating element, safety cap with safety valve, and a low water indicator

1.9L Nominal Water Capacity | 15-20 Minutes Heat up Time | Up to 4 Hours of Continuous Steam |3.5 Bar Operating Pressure | 1000W External Long-Life Heating Element | 1800W Watts Total Power (1000W Boilers + 800W Iron)
body.description: Introducing Eco-Mode in the all new 4100IS steam iron station. Eco-Mode will save you up to 33% in energy costs by reducing the energy consumption when the boiler is not being used. Smart for your wallet and smart for the planet. The 4100IS has an absolute capacity of 2.2L, uses our new external heating element system to optimize the amount of steam available to use and has an operating pressure of 3.5 bar / 50 P.S.I. for maximum ironing efficiency. The professional cork handled iron, made for tailors, seamstresses, sewists and garment production uses our exclusive 32 steam chamber design to prevent condensation and provide dry steam.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing Eco-Mode in the all new 4100IS steam iron station. Eco-Mode will save you up to 33% in energy costs by reducing the energy consumption when the boiler is not being used. Smart for your wallet and smart for the planet. The 4100IS has an absolute capacity of 2.2L, uses our new external heating element system to optimize the amount of steam available to use and has an operating pressure of 3.5 bar / 50 P.S.I. for maximum ironing efficiency. The professional cork handled iron, made for tailors, seamstresses, sewists and garment production uses our exclusive 32 steam chamber design to prevent condensation and provide dry steam. 2.2L Boiler Stainless Steel Boiler 1.9L Nominal Water Capacity Eco Mode Saves Up To 33% Energy 1800W Watts Total Power (1000W Boilers + 800W Iron)

STAND BY AND SAVE UP TO 33% When you are ready to use it again, simply turn the switch back on and in less than 2 minutes you’re ready to work. Congratulations, you’ve just saved yourself up to 33% in energy costs. OUR BOILERS After extensive research and development and exhaustive testing, we’re pleased to announce an all new stainless steel 2.2L boiler for the 4100 series boilers. Now up to 50% thicker!! PROFESSIONAL IRON WITH 1.8M STEAM HOSE We’ve made the 1.8kg iron with just the right weight; light but not too light. We still use 100% natural cork which is the world’s best insulation between your hand and the iron.

SUPER DRY STEAM IRON TECHNOLOGY Producing perfect quality steam doesn’t happen by chance. Our 2100IR iron uses our patented 32 separate steam chamber soleplate which eliminates condensation and delivers the superior quality steam. 4 SAFETY SYSTEMS The 4100IS has 4 safety systems including a pressure switch, thermostat protection, safety cap with safety valve and a low water indicator. ITALIAN QUALITY ”Made in Italy” is a sign of prestige in the industry. We are proud that the production of our commercial boilers are 100% Made in Italy. Che Bello!

IT’S ALL ABOUT THE STEAM The 4100IS excels at producing quality, dry, pressurized steam. Pressurized steam is the fastest & most efficient way of ironing. It allows the fibers of the fabric to be softened quicker, with the weight and heat of the iron laying the fibers down flat.

Reliable 4100IS Professional Steam Iron Station Reliable 5100IS/2100IR Professional Iron Station Reliable 6000IS Professional Steam Iron Station Reliable 7000IS Professional Steam Iron Station Reliable 8000IS Professional Automatic Steam Iron Station Reliable 9000IS Professional Automatic Steam Iron Station Boiler Tank 0.66 Gal 0.66 Gal 1.25 Gal 2.37 Gal 1.25 Gal 1.25 Gal Operating Pressure 50 PSI - 3.5 BAR 50 PSI - 3.5 BAR 60 PSI - 4.1 BAR Up to 70 PSI - 4.8 BAR Up to 70 PSI - 5 BAR Up to 70 PSI - 5 BAR Heat-up Time 10-15 Minutes 10-15 Minutes 15-20 Minutes 30-40 Minutes 20 - 30 Minute 20 - 30 Minute Steam Time Up to 4 Hours Up to 4 Hours Up to 6 Hours Up to 8 Hours Unlimited hours with continuous fill Unlimited hours with continuous fill Steam Connector - Quick-Release Quick-Release Quick-Release Quick-Release Quick-Release Tank Stainless steel Stainless steel Stainless steel Stainless steel Stainless steel Stainless steel Wattage (Boiler + Iron) 1800W 1800W 2000W 2000W 2000W 2000W Blowdown Valve - - ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Amp Service 15 Amps 15 Amps 20 Amps 20 Amps 20 Amps 20 Amps Country of Origin Italy Italy Italy Italy Italy Italy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for when I travel. I have a very hard time keeping my business cloths from getting wrinkled and hate traditional irons in the hotel rooms. This steamer has worked great. I would definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My wife loves it
reviews.reviewText: Since my wife is doing a lot of sewing and clothes designing, we needed an iron, but before we purchased different brands from Hobby Lobby, and she wasn't satisfied. Finally, we ordered this iron, which works just perfect. It produces immediate heat, and it's safe for any kimd of fabric. Also, it's very weightless, so she can use it for hours. In addition, the water tang has a decent size and the hose it's long enough. Easy to use and great product.
This is our second professional steam iron. The only problem with this product is steam boiler that “goes”. All in all very happy with it. Makes life easier
